entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
